name: Running Out of Power
description:
Play this creatively titled game while you're playing much better ones!

The goal of this game is to keep your laptop's battery charge under a certain percentage for as long as possible! You'll have to manage your power carefully at higher (technically lower, according to how I phrased it in game) difficulties, otherwise your laptop will Run Out of Power!

Please keep the .dll files in the same folder as the executable for Windows. For Mac users, go crazy!

(There's a help page in the game.)
